m_szDocTitle: Trina Solar, SunPower, First Solar, Hanwha Q-cells, & Jinko Solar Solar PV Module Leaders | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Trina Solar, SunPower, First Solar, Hanwha Q-cells, & Jinko Solar Solar PV Module Leaders August 10th, 2016 by Joshua S Hill   Trina Solar, SunPower, First Solar, Hanwha Q-cells, and Jinko Solar have been labelled the solar PV module supplier leaders, according to a new Scorecard report from IHS Markit. Published this week, global business analyst IHS Markit released its PV Module Supplier Scorecard, which labelled Trina Solar, SunPower, First Solar, Hanwha Q-cells, and Jinko Solar as the industry leaders.
